content.p: Delinquent taxes and assessments shall be noted on the title register when the officer charged with the collection of taxes files with the clerk a certificate substantially in the following form: NOTATION OF DELINQUENT TAXES I certify that __________________________ (state, county, or city, as the case may be) has a lien for unpaid taxes (or assessments, as the case may be) for the year ________ against the land described in certificate No. __________, Registered Title No. __________, registered in the office of the clerk of the Superior Court of ________________________ County, in the amount of $_____________. The clerk will please note the same on the title register. This ________ day of ________________________, ________. _____________________________________________________________________ Tax Collector
